title: Chip maker SK Hynix's Q3 net profit sinks 89%
text:
SK Hynix Inc.'s (000660.SE) net profit plunged in the third quarter, though by less than expected as the decline in memory-chip prices eased.

Net profit for the quarter ended September was 495.48 billion Korean won ($423.2 million) compared with KRW4.692 trillion in the same quarter a year earlier, the South Korean chip maker said Thursday.

The results beat consensus forecasts for net profit of KRW303.54 billion provided by FactSet.

Revenue during the quarter fell 40% on year to KRW6.839 trillion.

Operating profit dropped 93% on year to KRW472.56 billion.

SK Hynix said a recovery in demand and the moderation of the decline in memory-chip prices helped sustain growth and earnings for the quarter.

Write to Kwanwoo Jun at kwanwoo.jun@wsj.com
